column5: can any one tell me if underwater fishing lights legal in ontario? coulldnt find anythings on this in regulations. thanks
Last time I checked NO but I may be wrong, my wife says I'am wrong all the time. Jeff

it is illegal to use artificial light to attract fish unless fishing for smelt,whitefish or lake herring  in your fishing reg book2010 from the ministry on page 8 is were you find that under general prohibition
Irish is right. If the light is attached to your line or is the lure itself its legal!
